item.title: redux

item.title: reduce
item.description: [0, 1, 2, 3, 4, 5].reduce((previous, current) => { return current + previous; }); 0 + 1 = 1 1 + 2 = 3 3 + 3 = 6 6 + 4 = 10 10 + 5 = 15 this.http.get('data/recipe-data.json') .map(res => { return res.json().categories.reduce((pre, cur) => { let prevResult = Number.isInteger(pre) ? pre : pre.recipes.length return Math.max(prevResult, cur.recipes.length); }) }) .subscribe(data => { console.log(data); });
